info.name: Ronald Rivero
info.title: FullStack and AWS Cloud Developer - GenAI

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a FullStack and AWS Cloud Developer, passionate about Linux. My stack is primarily based on Python—along with C and JavaScript—to create high‑performance REST APIs and web applications (SPA / PWA). I integrate Generative Artificial Intelligence to automate analysis and design personalized experiences. Curiosity drives me to explore cutting‑edge open‑source technologies. As a teacher and mentor in programming, AI, and development boards, I enjoy transforming complex concepts into accessible knowledge, empowering the next generation to build robust and scalable systems.
